nodes.text: Hethra Mcgrrrr was a male Human criminal from Corellia who lived during the first years of the Galactic Empire.

He was remembered for founding and leading the Black Hole Gang, a pirate band that engaged in shipjackings and plundering throughout the Delphon system during the Clone Wars and the first days of the Empire's New Order. At some point, Mcgrrrr left the leading seat of the gang, though the circumstances of his departure were likely violent
He was also remembered as the father of Opun "Black Hole" Mcgrrrr, a criminal businessman who rose to prominence during the rise of the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Civil War.
